text: Shaolin Chamber of Death () (Shao Lin mu ren xiang) is a 1976 Hong Kong action movie directed by Chen Chi-Hwa and starring Jackie Chan, Hwang Jang Lee, Yuen Biao, Lo Wei, Tien Miao, Chiang Kam. It was distributed by Lo Wei Productions. ==Other websites== * * Category:1976 action movies Category:Hong Kong action movies
title: Shaolin Chamber of Death
